prompts.name: Nunjucks Conditionals and Loops Example
prompts.description: Demonstrates how to use Nunjucks conditional statements ({% if %}) and loops ({% for %}) in prompt templates.

arguments.name: show_details
arguments.description: A boolean (true/false) to determine if details should be shown.

arguments.name: item_list
arguments.description: A list of simple string items (e.g., ["apple", "banana", "cherry"])

arguments.name: object_list
arguments.description: A list of objects, each with 'name' and 'price' properties (e.g., [{name: "Book", price: 20}, {name: "Pen", price: 2}])

prompts.name: Nunjucks Advanced Features Example
prompts.description: Demonstrates advanced Nunjucks features like macros and setting variables.

arguments.name: user1_data
arguments.description: An object containing data for the first user (e.g., {name: "Alice", email: "alice@example.com", is_vip: true}).

arguments.name: user2_data
arguments.description: An object containing data for the second user (e.g., {name: "Bob", join_date: "2023-05-15"}).
